Serve to impress. From log to glossy, end grain cheese board—it’s all harvested and assembled locally in a small Nova Scotia mill. It even has rubber feet to prevent moisture from getting trapped. With proper care and seasoning, this heirloom Larch Wood board will last you a lifetime.

It takes the guesswork out of grilling and even updates itself automatically. GrillEye Max uses the GrillEye Hyperion app that allows you to control any number of Max thermometers from anywhere. It also enables you to organize and record your activity in Sessions and keep track of your pitmaster record.

These ice grippers make walking on snow and ice safer. Suitable for adults as well as teenagers and older children, Nordic Grip Minis are ideal to wear in any snow or icy conditions. They pull on to the toe box of all types of footwear: formal shoes, trainers, boots, high heels and rain boots .
A dishwasher-safe spatula with an LED light built into the handle makes grilling a breeze, day and night.

This headrest is specifically angled for comfortable lounging on the beach, and features a hollow center, which is perfect for storing essentials like keys, sunscreen, a wallet, or cellphone.

This portable, waterproof, soft cooler is designed to be worn comfortably like a backpack and keeps ice frozen for up to 24 hours. The Pro Coolers come in two sizes to hold up to 24 cans with ice and keep them colder longer.

TNK: Stingray BBQ Multitool - Red

Easily make individual portions of hamburger, soup, stew, sauce, or baby food, then freeze. Individual portions pop right out of the tray, as needed. Use as a burger press, too. Fill the tray with meat and press on the top. Eight patties made instantly, hands-free.
Chef-grade, triple filtered, non-clogging butane fuel to refill your Airlighter. 3 pack.

This innovative, bristle-free brush is a smarter way to clean your grill. The double helix design has two continuous springs to get the grease and food particles off the grill grates. No rough edges to cut you, and no need to worry about metal bristles falling out and getting in your food.

A blend of bison down and merino wool makes the Ultimate American Sock a warm, cushy, and durable way to keep your feet snug and dry. Completely Made in the USA—from the North Dakota materials to the Pennsylvania packaging—these socks help our country’s environment, too. For every pair sold, the company cleans a pound of litter from our nation’s waterways.
Nirvanna Designs: Bunny Earmuffs
Flylow Gear: Blaster Glove - Small

Durable leather gloves get one step tougher with baked-in waterproofing sealer. Each pair is heated in the oven—three times—to cure the sealer. More flexible than ski gloves, these unisex winter utility gloves are dexterous and toasty warm, thanks to HeatRac insulation. For anyone who spends time in the cold, it's a perfect balance of warmth and function.

These snow and ice melting mats work just like ice melt or rock salt, but more efficiently, quickly, and neatly. Each mat contains sodium, magnesium, and calcium chloride (the same ingredients in rock salt). But the mat only releases as much as is needed. The rest of the melting agent stays contained in the durable nylon casing, and works in temperatures all the way down to -15 degrees.
Cheeky Fishing: Tyro Fly Reel - 375

The secure stakes from Speed Cinch make tying down ropes, cords, and lines a quick and simple task—without tying any knots. Just feed the rope through the cinch, loop it around, and lock it into place. Each stake goes into the ground, so it can easily be moved around and reused for different tasks. Use it to hold lines for tents, canopies, or for landscaping jobs, like tying back bushes.

These all-natural firestarters get flames going quickly and easily, without using any accelerants or kerosene. Stokes uses just three ingredients—sawdust, paraffin wax, and recycled egg cartons—and that’s all. Light one under charcoal or wood to start a fire in the fireplace, on the grill, or in a wood burning stove.
CGear: Quicksand Utility Mat - Large - Blue

Stay outdoors longer with the Chaheati Stadium Seat Cushion. It's cordless, lightweight, and portable so you can take it anywhere. The rechargeable heating system provides up to six hours of heat so you can stay comfy in the cold.
The Great Scrape is an all-natural BBQ cleaning tool with custom grooves that wear over time for a perfect fit with any grill.

Think of it as a down jacket for your camera. This padded shell protects your camera, and has a rain fly for extra safety from the elements. The lightweight design won’t weigh you down, and it comes off in a flash (pun intended) so it won’t interfere with getting that perfect shot, too.
Matador: Pocket Blanket - Red
Sterling Brooke: Fish Pocket Knife - Scales

This rugged design turns a five-gallon bucket into a cooler. It keeps drinks or bait cool, and can even work sans bucket as a soft-sided cooler. The water-resistant, double-stitched design is durable, with plenty of pockets for extra storage (like tackle or other gear).

This tough, durable lid locks in drinks (or bait) to keep things cool and secure. It has a handy reach-in opening, a gasket to drain water or run an aerator line, and a reinforced design that doubles as a spot to sit, too.
Sportula: Classic Grilling Spatula - College - Arkansas Razorbacks
Sportula: Classic 3-Piece BBQ Set - College - UCLA Bruins
A lightweight, easy-to-pack pump for your tent or anything else that needs some inflating.
This pocket-sized two-in-one is a hand warmer phone charger. Recharge a phone, or keep hands warm for anywhere between three to four hours.
DiamondKingSmoker: Smoker Grill Box - 4x4
DiamondKingSmoker: Exotic Wood Smoking Chunks - Red Wine
DiamondKingSmoker: Premium Smoking Wood Pellets - Wild Cherry
MangataLites: Rechargeable Lighted Mittens - Pink - Large

This efficient stainless steel stove is durable enough to last a lifetime. The Solo Stove Titan's double-chamber build circulates preheated oxygen to fuel the flame, burning it easily and with less smoke. It also features a cooking ring with an angled lip that increases efficiency by directing heat towards your pot minimizing heat loss. The Titan's smaller size is perfect for cooking food for two to four people.

This large stainless steel stove is durable enough to last a lifetime. The Solo Stove Campfire's double-chamber build circulates preheated oxygen to fuel the flame, burning it easily and with less smoke. It also features a cooking ring with an angled lip that increases efficiency by directing heat towards your pot minimizing heat loss. The Campfire's larger size is perfect for cooking food for four or more people.

The lightweight Solo Stove Pot 1800 is the companion pot crafted specifically for use with the Solo Stove Titan. When nested, the Solo Stove Titan fits inside the Pot 1800 for easy storage. Made with durable stainless steel, the Pot 1800 holds up to 61 fl oz and can cook for two to four people.

product_name: Campfire Stainless Steel Pot - Set of 2
product_short_description: The lightweight Solo Stove 2 Pot Set is the companion pot set crafted specifically for use with the Solo Stove Campfire. When nested, the Solo Stove Campfire fits inside the 2 Pot Set for easy storage. Made with durable stainless steel, the Pot Set comes with two pots that can cook for four or more people.

This lightweight, quick-dry towel is sized for easy on-the-go use, like on trips or at the gym. It can absorb more than its weight in water and dries three times faster than a cotton towel, thanks to a tightly woven microfiber design that feels soft like suede. The towel is also sand-resistant, making it the perfect companion on beach days.
RovR: High Performance Cooler with Wheels - 45 Quart - Orange
Take your RovR cooler with wheels on your next bike trip. This lightweight tow kit includes a tow bar and all the tools you need to pull the rugged cooler with your bike.

Customize your rugged RovR cooler with wheels with a handy add-on that makes it the perfect sidekick on camping and biking trips, or on any adventure. The steel cup holder secures two drinks on an anchor point that allows for easy access to the inside of the cooler.

This stainless steel insert transforms your charcoal grill into a grill top pizza oven. It sits on the grill grate and is designed to maintain and circulate heat (from a combination of charcoal and hardwood) to cook a crispy pizza in about five minutes.

This stainless steel insert transforms a gas grill into a grill top pizza oven. It sits on the grill grate and is designed to maintain and circulate heat to cook a crispy pizza in about eight minutes.
Proud Grill Company: Reusable Grill Cleaner Set

On the go, at home, or at the office, this portable, rechargeable fan handily provides a cool-down when you need one. Its small but powerful design can be used handheld or in its stand that sticks (and can be moved and re-stuck) to surfaces—even upside down. The fan can also give a device a quick power-up thanks to an integrated USB charging port.
Lagu: Sand Repellent Blanket - Aguamarino - Large
Bison Airlighter: Rapid Fire Starter - Orange

This eco-friendly instant grill does the same job as its aluminum counterpart, but in a completely natural and biodegradable design. The cardboard frame, bamboo grill grates, and lava stone lining (to help retain heat) quickly assemble, and bamboo charcoal briquettes heat up in about five minutes and stay hot for around an hour. When you’re done cooking, you can toss the grill into a campfire or in a trash bin knowing it will naturally decompose.
Sportula: #1 Oven Mitt - NFL - New Orleans Saints
Grill Armor Gloves: 932°F Heat-Resistant Grilling Gloves - One-Size Black & Grey

The BOSS grill spatula does not mess around when it comes to functionality. The sturdy stainless steel design has an extra-long wood handle and packs the must-have tools—fork, serrated edge, knife edge, and (the most important) bottle opener—into one heavy-duty spatula, streamlining utensil clutter and eliminating trips in and out of the house.

product_name: Slide & Serve BBQ Skewers - Set of 4
product_short_description: Reusable metal skewers are a better way to make better kabobs. The durable stainless steel steer- and fish-themed skewers are lined with tines that give proteins and veggies more contact with the grill, which means things cook more evenly. This also makes for easier flipping (with no rolling) and removal when it’s time to eat. Hooked tips help keep food in place.

product_name: Slide & Serve BBQ Skewers - Set of 2
product_short_description: Reusable metal skewers are a better way to make better kabobs. The durable stainless steel steer- and fish-themed skewers are lined with tines that give proteins and veggies more contact with the grill, which means things cook more evenly. This also makes for easier flipping (with no rolling) and removal when it’s time to eat. Hooked tips help keep food in place.

Use these copper grill mats over and over again for grilling fish, chicken, bacon, vegetables, and anything else you're craving. And once you're done with the main course, the grill mats can be used in the oven for all your baking needs.

Tackle storage done (finally) better, thanks to a molded silicone anchoring system. Hard bait and lures stay neatly organized inside a durable case lined with grippy anchor slots that hold them in place. The Launch Pad does the same tidying-up job in an out-of-the-box way by adhering to the side of a boat, kayak, or cooler to give you easy, organized access.

This smart meat thermometer and app work together to keep an eye on what’s cooking, so you don’t have to. The wireless stainless steel probe reads the temperature of meat and the ambient temperature in a grill or oven, and connects to the easy-to-use app. The app sends you alerts and cooking times on your phone—even a five-minute warning that food like steak or chicken is almost ready. It’s perfect for beginners and busy hosts, and recharges in a sleek wooden dock.

The BBQ Dragon charcoal grill fan helps get the fire going quickly. Portable, adjustable, and rechargeable, the hands-free fan clips onto the grill and helps speed up the fire-making process so you can get to the tastier results quicker.

Don’t let the name fool you. This charcoal chimney is a super-smart update of the typical design that helps get fires burning faster and hotter. An elbow-shaped vent allows for better airflow and means you can add your starter from the side—no more lifting a full chimney to light it, and no need for lighter fluid, either.

Grilling veggies? Just roll with it. This stainless steel grilling basket holds more than typical grill baskets can and its round design promotes even cooking for those veggies and other grill-friendly foods like chicken wings and shrimp.

Light your smoker in seconds with these non-petroleum RapidFire FireStarters. Made of natural, food-safe smoking wood that burns incredibly hot, your fire will have a solid head start—FireStarters burn for 20 minutes or more. For use with the DiamondKingSmoker Grill Box.

Display patriotic pride grillside with American flag tongs. Old Glory is laser-engraved into the sturdy stainless steel tool and solid mahogany handles give you a good grip on grill jobs. Made in the USA.
Fireside Outdoor: Pop-Up Pit Portable Fire Pit - Pop-Up Pit (No Heat Shield)

This stainless steel smoking pouch is the catalyst to a great grill session. Fine mesh limits air flow into the metal pouch, so wood chips heat quickly but won’t catch fire. Lay the non-rust pouch among proteins and veggies to infuse it all with tasty smoky flavor.

A smoking pouch and wood chips set is the solution to smoky-tasty grilled foods. The durable stainless steel pouch is filled with the included mesquite, apple, or hickory wood chips. As the pouch heats, chips smolder white smoke, infusing food with flavor without extra effort.
The Smokist™: Wood Chips for Smoking Pouch - Apple

The Moki vehicle rooftop doorstep lets you reach the top of your car in a safer way. It’s a step-up that quickly attaches to your vehicle's door latch. The aluminum step has space for both feet and treads for extra stability. Use it to access a roof rack or for easier car cleaning, and store it in the glove compartment when you’re done.

product_name: The Muncher Titanium Spork Multi Tool
product_short_description: The Muncher packs a punch with ten functionalities. Made from aerospace grade titanium, it weighs just 0.7 ounces and is the ideal companion on any trip where weight and space are a consideration. Its versatility makes it a must for every adventurer and traveler, be it camping in your back yard to backpacking around the world.

A compact and minimalist super lightweight multi-utensil for camping and backpacking. The Splitter is made of two separate titanium utensils—one spatula and one long spork— which when joined together, turn into a set of tongs. It's the pinnacle of outdoor utensils, made from the highest quality materials available.

This cutting board is a lightweight and elevated work surface that gives you a clean place to prepare and enjoy a meal. The bamboo top is a great cutting surface and is naturally anti-microbial. It is lightly coated with a vegetable oil finish and is easy to clean.

This coffee maker is compact and makes rich and delicious coffee. It works like a classic Italian Moka Pot, however, it's designed for camping. It's about the size of a water bottle and has folding handles and a nesting cup, making it compact and easy to pack. The cup has a silicone wrap for grip and insulation.

These stainless steel camping cups are a great addition to your camp kitchen and a wonderful companion for any outdoor activity. These cups are double-walled for insulation and are stackable to easily pack and carry.

The nCamp Multi-Fuel Camping Stove is designed to use twigs for fuel, reducing weight in your pack and providing a seemingly endless supply of fuel. The stove has an innovative collapsing combustion chamber, allowing it to pack flat and reducing bulk in your pack. It's designed to use wood but it can also use solid (hexamine), liquid fuels (diethylene glycol) and Iso-Propane (with the custom nCamp Gas Adapter).
nCamp: Kitchen-To-Go Camping Set - Basic

Heavy duty and durable, SnoShark is the first of its kind. The Collapsible Paddle Snow Removal Tool was designed to remove snow efficiently in order to get you on the road faster. The tool can also be used as an ice scraper to assist in clearing windows. Lightweight, collapsible, and able to extend to two locking positions.

This magnetic pellet grill shelf doubles—and then some⁠—the storage space on a hopper surface, adding more room for tools, sauces, plates and more. It firmly and quickly attaches to the grill while still providing access to the hopper. Made with rust-resistant, powder-coated steel.

Trac-Grabbers provide a quick, simple, and effective solution to being stranded in all types of terrain and adverse conditions. No matter what type of vehicle you have—whether SUV, truck, small vehicles, large, heavy vehicles or car—Trac-Grabber will get your vehicle unstuck.
LavaGrip: Eco-Friendly Ice Melt Alternative - 17.6 Pound Bag

Spark a charcoal or wood fire with an electric lighter that sidesteps gas, flame, and lighter fluid to do its job. Instead, this fire starter creates super-heated air that gets up to 1100 degrees Fahrenheit in about a minute. Its safety casing cools within seconds, and a built-in bottle opener makes it an all-in-one grillside and fireside essential.

This portable electric grill delivers that charcoal-cooked taste in a faster and much more convenient way. Just lay down a layer of charcoal, plug the grill in, and turn up the heat. It can get up to a ready-to-cook 950 degrees in about six minutes with no fire starters or lighter fluid needed, and with less mess on your hands.

With a pellet grill drip pan liner in place, greasy, drippy messes are better contained so you can concentrate on grilling—and worry less about clean-up duty. The lipped aluminum trays come in four sizes to best fit the most common pellet grills and can get tossed out when grill time is done.
Crescent Moon Snowshoes: Neoprene Snowshoe Booties - Large

This magnetic BBQ grill set looks like one thing, but is quite another—make that two others. The stainless steel pieces work as a spatula and fork separately, but can be magnetically connected to serve as tongs and a server.

Start a fire or light a candle in an easier way. This electric lighter creates a charging arc without a flame or any odor. Best of all? It is USB rechargeable, so it’s a reusable and longer-lasting alternative to disposable butane lighters.
Orange Screw: Small Ground Screw - Single

This instant-read meat thermometer lets you know the temperature of cooking meat in just a few seconds. Its needle-tipped probe makes for easy insertion into meats like chicken, ribs, beef, and pork. The thermometer turns on automatically when the probe is unfolded, and compacts for easy storage.

Prevent grillables from sticking to grates with non-stick grill mats. The Teflon™-coated mats are extra-wide to cover lots of grill surface and extra-thin to let searing heat pass through. They’re heat resistant up to 525° Fahrenheit, dishwasher safe, and make for easier food flipping and turning and faster grill clean-up.

A cast iron grill press lends a heavy-duty hand out on the grill or when you’re cooking on the stove. It works to squeeze out extra fat and flatten foods like burgers, bacon, and steaks for faster cooking, or you can use it to grill sandwiches panini-style.

Make burgers that are a little bit extra, and a little bit easier, with a burger press. This tool helps create perfectly uniform patties and stuffed burgers full of tastiness—think onions, cheese and more—and it has a mold to help make sliders, too.
BBQ Croc: 3-in-1 BBQ Tool - 21 Inch

No hose, no problem. The adjustable PCS shower head attachment plugs right into place to work with an ExtremeMist Personal Cooling System backpack. It operates with a wireless remote control and is great for on-the-go (or in-the-woods) rinses.

The pull string firestarter will simply and safely start your fire, no matter what the weather is. Matches and lighters are not needed. Each pull string firestarter is windproof, rainproof, safe for cooking, and will last a full thirty minutes.

product_name: Reusable Grill Cleaning Cloths - Set of 2
product_short_description: Target grill grime with a reusable grill cleaning cloth that works with the Q-Swiper Grill Scrubber. It’s durable, absorbent, dishwasher safe, and biodegradable. It can do its clean-up job inside a grill and on its exterior, too. A cloth can be reused up to 200 times and when it’s done, it can be composted.
VertiGrille®: 10-in-1 Grill & Oven Rack - 24 Skewer Set

This plunger fishing line cutter has a unique design that makes it feel better in hand and makes cutting any line an easier task—so you can get back to fishing faster. Its sturdy carbide blade helps minimize fraying and a slotted tip helps secure the line while you’re at work.

No roof rack? No problem. This foam block kayak carrier system lets you secure a kayak to a car roof safely and without causing damage. It can do the job even with a roof rack in place, too. The blocks are V-shaped to cradle a kayak while locking straps secure them to a roof to help prevent shifting during transit.

Haul gear safely and keep it dry with a set of built-tough waterproof cargo bags. They are tear-, cut-, and abrasion-resistant and made to fit side by side in a truck bed or on a hitch rack. The lightweight bags can adapt to what you want to carry thanks to an adjustable roll-top opening, and sturdy straps keep them secured. When the moving job is done, these lightweight bags compact into small storage sacks.

Get your grill on with a multi-purpose grill rack that can handle ribs on one side or wings (up to thirty-six) on the other. It works with drumsticks, too. The stainless steel rack makes the most out of grill space and means you only need one rack to switch between grill jobs.
Holster Brands: Silicone BBQ Holster - Black
GrillEye: Meat Thermometer Probe

This hybrid grilling and smoking thermometer can switch between Bluetooth and WiFi to keep you connected to what’s cooking without being chained to the grill. Two probes track ambient temperature inside the grill as well as the meat’s temperature and let you know via app or LED display when it’s time to eat.

This smart multi-measure meat thermometer helps ensure that meat is cooked consistently throughout. It has six sensors built in: five to register the internal temperature of a piece of meat or chicken and one to check the air temperature of the grill or oven. An app keeps tabs on low or cool temps and alerts you when cooking time is up. Opt for an additional sensor probe to the base unit to keep tabs on two cuts cooking at the same time.

This non-toxic waterproof fire starter lights up anywhere—even in extreme conditions like rain, snow, cold, or wind. It has a 30-year shelf life and produces no odor when it burns. The starter has a continuous burn time of up to ten minutes, and it’s safe to use indoors or outside.
Winter Woods: Pinecone Potpourri & Fire Color Set - Fire Color Cones

The Windshield Ice Scraper by Scrape-A-Round has a cone-shaped design, allowing you to double the scraping action with each pass. Simply move the scraper in small circular or linear motions to remove ice, frost, and snow from your windshield. Created with formulated plastic to hold up in winter temperatures. Made in the USA.
Horizons Soft Coolers: Durable Drink Cooler Bag - 40 Pack - Red

For your next swimming pool game, toss around a Watermelon... Ball. Modeled after a real-life watermelon, this rubber ball can be dribbled, kicked, passed, and bounced—all under water. Fill it up with water and a little bit of air to make it neutrally buoyant—its density will match that of the surrounding water, so it doesn’t sink or float. Instead, it stays suspended in the H2O.

This grill brush features a unique triple-headed stainless steel brush that allows for a 360° clean of your grates. The bristle-free design safely removes food residue without leaving any wire bristles behind. Conveniently use the tool to scrub and lift grates or scrape griddles clean.
BBQ Butler: Canvas Apron - Black

The credit card sized, stainless steel cordage making tool creates rope from plastic bottles. The multifunctional cordage created from this tool can be used for hundreds of tasks including gardening and camping. One 2-liter bottle can create over 50 feet of line. Made in the USA.

This light and handle not only makes your 30 oz tumbler easier to hold and carry, but also gives you the power of light without moving a finger. No more slipping, dripping, or tripping in the dark while trying to balance your tumbler when your hands are full. It fits most standard vehicle cup holders, and perfectly holds your tumbler secure with the rubberized grip ring.

The Perforated Pizza Peel is a high-quality, lightweight peel for sliding, turning, and retrieving pizzas from your oven with ease. Use the tapered peel edge to slide straight under pizza bases, while the perforations allow for the steam to quickly evaporate and excess flour to fall away from the pizza base. A super-sleek, hard anodized coating provides increased corrosion resistance and a hyper-smooth surface to guarantee a seamless experience when launching and retrieving pizzas.
Know exactly when your Ooni oven has reached the optimal temperature for cooking all your favorites within seconds with this instant-read thermometer. Compatible with all Ooni ovens.
Keep your Ooni oven free from garden debris and protect it from harsh weather conditions.
Spider Tarp: Heavy Duty Adjustable Bungee Cord - 4-Pack - Hook & Carabiner

product_name: Waterproof Tarp with Attached Bungee Cords
product_short_description: These waterproof tarps are easy to use and durable with a tangle-free design for quick and easy load covering. The tarp includes abrasion-resistant, high-strength bungee cords with no knots to tie, buckles to thread, or mechanical ratchets.
Zippo: HeatBank® 9S Handwarmer & Powerbank - Plus - Black

product_name: Cutting Board & BBQ Prep Tub Station
product_short_description: Conveniently use the tub to prep large pieces of meat before going to the grill. Perfect for applying dry rubs and marinades. After grilling, collapse the tub to use the built-in cutting board base. The tub can also be filled with ice to keep your beverages cold. Easy to clean and to store in your kitchen.

Toss this surfer toy into the waves and it will self-right in the water and surf back to you. (Kind of like a water-based boomerang.) Kids will delight in throwing the toy and watching it come back time after time, which is the result of years of careful engineering. No batteries, no noise—just surfing fun at the beach.

Perfect pizza in every backyard. The Fyra streamlines wood-fired cooking for a no-nonsense experience and intense flavors. It's designed for optimal heat retention, which combined with the natural efficiency of wood pellets, results in an extraordinary cooking experience, maximum burn time, and minimal energy waste.

Take your tailgating experience to the next level with the SUV Tailgating Canopy Tent. It attaches to your rear hatch door and extends out from the vehicle to provide easy shade at sporting events or campgrounds. The sandbags attach to the canopy’s poles to keep them firmly planted to the ground, even in a strong wind.

product_name: 5.2” Clip Folding Knife with Bamboo Fold
product_short_description: The 5.2” Clip Folding Knife with Bamboo Fold is a fashion statement with a function. With its finger flip opening, the blade is easily deployed and held in place with a sturdy frame lock. The unique bamboo handle gives this knife a stand-out look that’s sure to catch anyone’s eye.

The Bug Repelling Mosquito Carabiner Clip repels mosquitos and flying insects without the use of chemicals. The proprietary blend of essential oils on the replaceable repellent tabs are stored within the neoprene and stainless steel clip, which can be attached to any bag or belt loop.

Backyard-made pizza in a minute flat—literally. The Ooni Koda outdoor gas pizza oven has a built-in ignition that heats it to a pizza-perfect 900 degrees in less than 15 minutes. A heat-control dial helps you stay on top of the temp when cooking a crispy pizza in 60 seconds and charred veggies and meats in under five minutes. Heading to an outdoor party? Take this compact—and chimney-less—portable oven with you. Connect to a gas source and it’s ready to fire up.

Say goodbye to dangerous wire bristles for good. You can thank a firefighter for this ingenious invention that steam cleans grease, grime, and gunk off your grill. Just dunk the heat-resistant cleaning head in water and run it over the grates. Easy to use, easy to clean—and easy on your arm muscles.

Get two favorite outdoor experiences in one with this super smart fire pit and grill combo. Four stainless steel pieces come together quickly to build a fire using wood or charcoal. It even comes with carrying handles so it can go where you go.

That case of your favorite beverages now has its own special cooler. This insulating sleeve wraps around a cold case to keep drinks chilled for up seven hours—without ice. Easy to carry along to campsites, the beach and so much more.

product_name: Dragon Wing Folding Shelf for 22 Grill"
product_short_description: Transform your 22” kettle grill with an all-in-one prep station. This clip-on steel side shelf goes on in seconds to hold tools, sauces, and of course—the food. Folds down to store inside your grill.

This non-stick rack does two grilling jobs in one. Use the rib side to hold six racks vertically so you can fit more—with even, open spaces for smoke and heat. When the ribs are done, flip the rack over for roasts, chicken, turkey—supported, elevated, and ready to grill to juicy perfection.

You don’t need an expensive smoker to get all that flavor in your grilled meats. Just fill this heavy-duty, smoker box with wood chips and place it over the flames. The chips release smoke through the holes and infuse the great taste of real smoked barbecue—no matter what kind of grill you cook on.

product_name: Magnetic LED BBQ Light - Set of 2
product_short_description: What looks like simple little lights are actually portable powerhouses for your grill. With three levels of brightness and a movable gooseneck, these efficient LED lights let you see what’s cooking. They even adjust from a honed-in spotlight to a wider beam of light. The magnetic bases let them pop on and off easily.

GrillEye® Max is an instant, ultra-precise smart thermometer for your grill or smoker. It notifies you that your food is ready, wherever you are. It takes the guesswork out of grilling and even updates itself automatically. GrillEye Max uses the GrillEye Hyperion app that allows you to control any number of Max thermometers from anywhere.
